message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $16,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm very interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe it's a good price considering the value it will bring to my business.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is significant. Let's meet in the middle - how about $13,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to my business.
